'''Host Transformation''' is a ninjutsu exclusive to the player avatars in ''[[Naruto to Boruto: Shinobi Striker]]''. The player momentarily takes the form of one of the following [[Tailed Beasts]]:

* {{translation|'''[[Matatabi|Two-Tails]]'''|二尾|Nibi}}: As Matatabi, the player jumps up and dives down on the opponent, causing a fiery explosion.
* {{translation|'''[[Isobu|Three-Tails]]'''|三尾|Sanbi}}: As Isobu, the player spins around, damaging any nearby opponent.
* {{translation|'''[[Saiken|Six-Tails]]'''|六尾|Rokubi}}: As Saiken, the player gathers bubbles together to form a [[Freight Bundle Bubble|large purple-coloured bubble]].
* {{translation|'''[[Chōmei|Seven-Tails]]'''|重明|Nanabi}}: As Chōmei, the player uses their wings to release a large gust of wind.
